Comment: I grew up in the area.   He was last seen in Baldwin, and is located in Long Beach.    Both tend to be more blue areas, depending on the part of the town (like north Baldwin is more blue than Baldwin harbor).  That being said Baldwin is within 5 minutes of Merrick, which is one of the towns that held a counter protest to the BLM protests.   It is also (for Baldwin and Long Beach) an area with lots of minorities.  The Merrick/Bellmore area tends to be more white.   Hopefully he is okay and found alive and well.  Edit to add: him getting abducted or killed isn't outside the realm of possibilities.  There is a high population density in the area and while I wouldn't consider it particularly unsafe people have been murdered before.
